entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Review CLR ETW manifest for typos #72324
  • JIT: Insertion of retbufs relies on aggressive importer spilling to not reorder calls #72323
    8.0.0
  • Bus error when parsing EventPipeProviderConfiguration in .NET Core 3.1 #72322
  • Memory corruption (EEE, AV, etc.) with GCStress and blank WF or WPF app #72321
  • Can not get NullabilityInfo of out/ref parameters #72320
  • [NativeAOT] Can't call a function pointer with a ref return value #72316
  • Remove redundant check of 128-bit bitmap of zeros in regex #72312
  • runtimeconfig.template support #72310
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.FrameworkResolution.RollForwardOnNoCandidateFxMultipleFrameworks.ReconcileFrameworkReferences_InnerFrameworkReference_PreRelease(versionReference: \"6.0.0\", rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx: null, applyPatches: null, resolvedFramework: \"6.2.1\") #58228
    7.0.0
  • Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension() does not throw ArgumentException ("Illegal characters in path") on Windows #72307
  • [DAC][DBI] ICorDebugModule::GetMetaDataInterface fails in net6.0 for "Anonymously Hosted DynamicMethods Assembly" in unit test project. #62977
    7.0.0
  • Clear Background flag when thread is stopped #72231
  • [API Proposal]: More helper methods for exception types #69637
    Future
  • Remove implicit fallback to reflection-based serialization in System.Text.Json sourcegen #71714
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/processenvironment/processenvironment/processenvironment.sh #68452
    7.0.0
  • readytorun\coreroot_determinism\coreroot_determinism\coreroot_determinism.cmd test failure #72276
  • Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist package support will end with .NET 6 #71231
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/PInvoke/SetLastError/SetLastErrorTest/SetLastErrorTest.sh #70296
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix "Clean" target for build, and publish #58826
    7.0.0
  • Codespaces should include gh cli #70361

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused field #72318
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Do not use the string bit vector in regexes, if it's all ones or all zeroes. #72317
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #72314
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add an area-owners.json file. Remove unused area. Format MD table. #72309
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add X509 SAN extension and RFC6125 MatchesHostname #72304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1885803 #72303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove unnecessary cast for num elements expression #72302
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Rename --instructionset to --instruction-set in ilc #72325
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Wbitwise-instead-of-logical in native tests #72313
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `Stream.HasOverridenBeginEndXXX` #72252
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix System.IO.FileSystem.DisabledFileLocking.Tests with NativeAOT #72311
    area-System.IO
  • Add clr.aot subset for convenience and document it #72251
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Always generate metadata for dynamic methods #72315
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reset ThreadState.Background on stopped threads #72296
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove fallback to reflection converter resolution #72228
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix singlefilehost build with clang 15 #72305
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] separate PromiseController<T> from cancellation #72273
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Disable gcstress for processenvironment test #72289
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist #71573
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Fix for older version of cmake #72300
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add the GitHub CLI to the Codespaces container #72287
    area-Meta
  • Do not run pipelines on .devcontainer changes #72295
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure last error is preserved for GCStress #72298
    GCStress, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Properly calculate the ELF unwind info section size #72146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Try fewer call spills #70932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix failing CI test, and misc fixes #72293
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed duplicated testcases as a follow-up for #70560 #71827
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 6 SDK #72145
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • enable OpenSSL tests on arm64 mac #72294
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Moving a type nested in a record to its own file creates a duplicate primary constructor declaration in the new partial record declaration #62713
  • Regression: RegisterPostInitializationOutput+AddSource added in source generator is duplicated resulting in compiler errors #62711

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `IMethodBodyOperationBase` should have a `Symbol` property #62705
  • LanguageSettingsPersister should Unadvise to the event sink #46167
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Implementation.Options.LanguageSettingsPersister loads settings eagerly (88ms) #29602
    Backlog
  • Replace usage of IVsTextManager4.GetUserPreferences4 with free-threaded alternative #56815
    17.3
  • LanguageSettingsPersister.TryFetch assertion is being hit #43393
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass LineFormatting options into OmniSharpCodeAction options #62712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62708
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62710
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62709
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62700
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62702
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62701
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation #62684
    Area-IDE, 17.4
  • Update SymReader to the latest version #62695
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.4
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62697
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add IWorkspaceProjectContextFactory F# wappers #62646
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62693
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62717
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62715
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow symbol keys to resolve against error symbols. #62681
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressable errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor component lifecycle and state management. #42758
  • Revise `RenderTreeBuilderAnalyzer` requirement to force "literal" sequence parameters #42756
  • App fails to process request and returns 503/404 when URL has more than 1 slash #42751

Closed

  • SoundPlayer: Add functions to start playing at Timestamp. #42759
  • Support multiple issuers in JwtBearerConfigureOptions #42000
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Correct a typo in the code comment #42753
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration #42679
    area-security, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • refactor : use new `ThrowIf` overload of `ObjectDisposedException` #42613
    area-blazor, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-16
